name: Four-Armed Gargoyle
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren\'t adamantine

traits.False Appearance: While the gargoyle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

actions.Multiattack: The gargoyle makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.
